inclusion.criterion: stable disease after no more than two attempts of induction therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: high-risk cytogenetics, t(4:14); t(14;16), t(14:20), deletion p17, gain in 1q
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: plasma cell leukemia in >= partial remission
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No contraindication to the collection of a minimum of 4 x 10^6 CD34+ cells/kg by apheresis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum glutamic-oxaloacetic transaminase (SGOT) and serum glutamate pyruvate transaminase (SGPT) < 2.5 x upper limits of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine of measured or calculated creatinine clearance of >= 50 cc/min
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosed or treated for another malignancy within 3 years of enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known hypersensitivity to filgrastim or to Escherichia coli (E. coli) derived proteins
exclusion.label: unknown
